snippet.title: UGLY - Teaser trailer
snippet.description:
Ugly is a psycho-dark fairy tale with new mechanics. You will have to swap the main character with his own reflection to solve puzzles, defeat bosses and discover all the secrets in a palace where nothing is what it seems.

 👉 Visit: https://uglythegame.com/
🐦 Follow: https://twitter.com/TeamUglyGames

#uglythegame #indiegame #ugly 
---------------------------------

ES: 
Ugly es un cuento de hadas trágico con mecánicas inéditas. Intercámbiate con tu reflejo para resolver puzzles, derrotar bosses y descubrir todos los secretos en un palacio, donde nada es lo que parece.
